title: Video: Fthrsn – Middle School Dance
content:
Fthrsn’s debut mini album, Middle School Swag, is fast becoming one of my most beloved albums of the year.

It’s perfectly situated for the time of my life I’m in right now; close enough to my school years to remember them with clarity, while also slowly feeling their relevance to my current life slipping. One of the highlights from the record, Middle School Dance, now has a video. It’s pretty fucking joyous.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
